ECLHENES Vprlntf bin2hex chop (PHP 4 >= 41.0, PHP 5, PHP 7, PHP 8) chr vprintf — Output a formatted string chunk_split convert_uudecode .. convert_uuencode Description count_chars cre32 . . crypt (string , array ): int e explode Display array values as a formatted string according to (which is described in the documentation for ). fprintf N get_html_translation_table Operates as but accepts an array of arguments, rather than a variable number of arguments. LAY hex2bin html_entity_decode htmlentities Parameters htmlspecialchars_decode htmlspecialchars implode The format string is composed of zero or more directives: ordinary characters (excluding %) that are copied directly to the result and join conversion specifications, each of which results in fetching its own parameter. cfirst levenshtein A conversion specification follows this prototype: %[argnum$][flags][width][.precision]lspecifier. localeconv Itrim md5_file Argnum mds metaphone
